titles.title: Equity in Athletics Disclosure Act

A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to disclose participation rates, and program support expenditures, in college athletic programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12029)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

bill.summary: 9/20/1993--Introduced. Equity in Athletics Disclosure Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to disclose gender participation rates and program support expenditures in college athletic programs to prospective students and, upon request, to the public. Directs the Secretary of Education to compile and publish annual reports of such data.
